channel.title: How I Met Your Mother on 2ynhub's Hugo Blog
channel.description: Recent content in How I Met Your Mother on 2ynhub's Hugo Blog

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E24 영어 표현
item.description: 1. rsvp (초대장에서) 회답 주시기 바랍니다(프랑스어 répondez s’il vous plaît(please reply)를 줄인 것). - Ted: You rsvp’d no.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E23 영어 표현
item.description: 1. too rich for one’s blood Too expensive or fancy to suit one’s taste or preferences. - Lily: So the only way you’re allowed to hook up with her is if you marry her. - Barney: Too rich for my blood. 2. great Scott An interjection of surprise, amazement, or dismay. - Barney: You still dating that guy? (놀라는 표정) Great scotch!

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E21 영어 표현
item.description: 1. sweep the leg To show no mercy or compassion, kicking someone while they’re down. The Karate Kid (1984)에 나온 대사. - Zabka: If I was gonna do anything, I’d sweep the leg, and put you in a body bag. 2. pickle 곤란한[불쾌한] 입장, 곤경. -Robin: Because sometimes I just feel like he never listens to me, you know? -Patrice: Gosh, caller, that’s a real pickle. 3. storm off To leave a place or a person suddenly because you are very angry.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E20 영어 표현
item.description: 1. cold turkey <흡연이나 마약 등을> 즉각 끊다. - Ted: From the moment Marshall left for Minnesota, Lily’s been secretly puffing down the ciggies like a 46-year-old grandma at a reno slot machine. Problem was, come Friday morning, she knew she’d have to quit again, cold turkey.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E19 영어 표현
item.description: 1. spin yarn 이야기를 장황하게 늘어놓다. - Ted: I’ve told you this one before. - Tracy: A few times. - Ted: I’m just a boring old man who won’t stop spinning yarns.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E08 영어 표현
item.description: 1. bury the hatchet 화해하다. - Barney: All Robin wants to do is put this whole thing behind her. - Loretta: Fine. If Robin’s ready to bury the hatchet, then I guess I’m ready to bury the hatchet. 2. pull your head out of your ass Stop ignoring the problems around you. - Lily: God, do you really think that you’re gonna find some perferct girl who checks off every item on your list?

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E06 영어 표현
item.description: 1. come around (미) [다른 의견·입장으로] 바꾸다, 동조하다, [싫었던 사람이] 좋아지다[to ‥]; 토론 등을 결말짓다, 화해하다. - Barney: He’s a mean old tool. - Lily: Oh, he can’t be that bad. I’ll get him to come around. 2. coming out the wazoo Having in a plentiful amount. - Lily: What did you do wrong? - Robin: We really wanted him to marry us. His church has cute coming out the wazoo.
